entries.name: Bite
entries: Your fanged maw is a natural weapon that deals 1d6 piercing damage.

entries.name: Cunning Artisan
entries: As part of a short rest, you can harvest bone and hide from a slain creature to craft items.

entries.name: Hold Breath
entries: You can hold your breath for up to 15 minutes.

entries.name: Hunter's Lore
entries: You gain proficiency in two skills of your choice from Animal Handling, Nature, Perception, Stealth, and Survival.

entries.name: Natural Armor
entries: You have tough, scaly skin. When you aren't wearing armor, your AC is 13 plus your Dexterity modifier.

entries.name: Hungry Jaws
entries: As a bonus action, you can make a special attack with your bite. If it hits, you gain temporary hit points equal to your proficiency bonus.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Draconic.
